actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize U.S. payment to the United Nations for expenses of the United Nations peacekeeping forces in the Middle East, and for other purposes.
short_title: United Nations Peacekeeping Forces in the Middle East Authorization Act

summary.text: United Nations Peacekeeping Forces in the Middle East Authorization Act - Authorizes to be appropriated to the Department of State such sums as necessary for payment of the United States share of the expenses of the United Nations peacekeeping forces in the Middle East.

titles.title: United Nations Peacekeeping Forces in the Middle East Authorization Act
A bill to authorize U.S. payment to the United Nations for expenses of the United Nations peacekeeping forces in the Middle East, and for other purposes.
